info.author: Ben Hayden

info.description:
Developed for my one-handed chording keyboard research project, so we can map
the most common keys to the most comfortable button-chords.
info.name: sysio
info.summary: This Pyrex wraps /usr/include/sys/io.h, allowing you to read/write bytes/ints directly from/to hardware ports. Also includes an example keylogger/keycounter.
info.html_description: Developed for my one-handed chording keyboard research project, so we can map the most common keys to the most comfortable button-chords.
